attributes.action: No to Prison statistics for Featherstone Brinsford Coven Shareshill & Essington
attributes.additional_details:
Why should the residents of our local villages of Featherstone, Brinsford, Coven, Essington & Shareshill be financially or otherwise disadvantaged because local statistics include the prisons that have been forced upon our communities.
These statistics feature high crime figures and now high covid figures due to the presence of the HMP’s in our area. 
Please stop the use of the HMP statistics in anything to with our villages
attributes.background:
Please make changes so Featherstone, Brinsford, Shareshill, Coven & Essington are not effected by the local Prison statistics.
We are financially effected by cost to our house, car & life insurance due to statistics of crime rate and now covid figures from the HMP Featherstone, Oakwood & Brinsford

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.  This is a matter for the Office for National Statistics.
